author: timbeiko
content:
FYI I've updated the Cancun Meta thread to list all the EIPs I'm aware have currently been proposed for Cancun: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/cancun-network-upgrade-meta-thread/12060

If your EIP is not listed there, DM me either here or on EthMagicians and I'll add it to the list. I encourage client teams to review the various proposals before the next ACD so we can have a good discussion about the scope of the upgrade. Feel free to leave any thoughts on the thread async too ðŸ™‚
